# Sanity Studio home page show more feature (2025-12-22 02:32Z)

_**User (2025-12-21 23:51Z)**_

in home page section, within sanity studio, user should able to allow show more/ explore more ( this text should be editable)  this one can be enable or disable, and user can choose with link or the page within this website it can be link to

```diff
        initialValue: true,
      }),
+     defineField({
+       name: 'showMore',
+       title: 'Show More / Explore More',
+       type: 'object',
+       description: 'Add a "Show More" or "Explore More" button at the bottom of this section',
+       fields: [
+         defineField({
+           name: 'enabled',
+           title: 'Enable Show More Button',
+           type: 'boolean',
+           description: 'Show the "Show More" button at the bottom of this section',
+           initialValue: false,
+         }),
+         defineField({
+           name: 'text',
+           title: 'Button Text',
+           type: 'string',
+           description: 'Text displayed on the button (e.g., "Show More", "Explore More", "Learn More")',
+           initialValue: 'Explore More',
+           hidden: ({ parent }) =&gt; !parent?.enabled,
+         }),
+         defineField({
+           name: 'linkType',
+           title: 'Link Type',
+           type: 'string',
+           options: {
+             list: [
+               { title: 'Internal Page (within website)', value: 'internal' },
+               { title: 'External URL', value: 'external' },
+             ],
+           },
+           initialValue: 'internal',
+           hidden: ({ parent }) =&gt; !parent?.enabled,
+         }),
+         defineField({
+           name: 'internalPage',
+           title: 'Internal Page',
+           type: 'string',
+           description: 'Page route within the website (e.g., /insights, /community, /#section-id)',
+           initialValue: '/insights',
+           hidden: ({ parent }) =&gt; !parent?.enabled || parent?.linkType !== 'internal',
+         }),
+         defineField({
+           name: 'externalUrl',
+           title: 'External URL',
+           type: 'url',
+           description: 'Full URL to an external website (e.g., https://example.com)',
+           hidden: ({ parent }) =&gt; !parent?.enabled || parent?.linkType !== 'external',
+         }),
+       ],
+     }),
      defineField({
        name: 'hero',
```

Creating a reusable ShowMore button component, then updating the section components:


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

<details><summary>Tool use: **write** • Edit file: /Users/phucpham/GitHub/AIFirst/components/show-more-button.tsx</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 60, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,60 @@
- 
+ import Link from "next/link"
+ import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
+ import { ArrowRight } from "lucide-react"
+ import type { ShowMoreConfig } from "@/lib/sanity/types"
+ 
+ interface ShowMoreButtonProps {
+   config?: ShowMoreConfig
+ }
+ 
+ export function ShowMoreButton({ config }: ShowMoreButtonProps) {
+   if (!config?.enabled || !config.text) {
+     return null
+   }
+ 
+   const href = config.linkType === 'external' 
+     ? config.externalUrl || '#' 
+     : config.internalPage || '#'
+ 
+   const isExternal = config.linkType === 'external'
+   const isAnchor = href.startsWith('#')
+ 
+   if (isExternal) {
+     return (
+       &lt;div className="flex justify-center mt-12"&gt;
+         &lt;Button
+           asChild
+           variant="outline"
+           size="lg"
+           className="group"
+         &gt;
+           &lt;a
+             href={href}
+             target="_blank"
+             rel="noopener noreferrer"
+           &gt;
+             {config.text}
+             &lt;ArrowRight className="ml-2 h-4 w-4 transition-transform group-hover:translate-x-1" /&gt;
+           &lt;/a&gt;
+         &lt;/Button&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;div className="flex justify-center mt-12"&gt;
+       &lt;Button
+         asChild
+         variant="outline"
+         size="lg"
+         className="group"
+       &gt;
+         &lt;Link href={href}&gt;
+           {config.text}
+           &lt;ArrowRight className="ml-2 h-4 w-4 transition-transform group-hover:translate-x-1" /&gt;
+         &lt;/Link&gt;
+       &lt;/Button&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   )
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

```diff
@@ -21,17 +21,18 @@
    switch (section.sectionType) {
      case 'hero':
-       return &lt;Hero hero={section.hero} /&gt;
+       return &lt;Hero hero={section.hero} showMore={section.showMore} /&gt;
```

## Summary

Added "Show More" / "Explore More" functionality to all homepage sections in Sanity Studio.

### 1. **Schema updates** (`pageSection.ts`)
- Added `showMore` object field with:
  - `enabled` (boolean) — toggle the button
  - `text` (string) — editable button text (default: "Explore More")
  - `linkType` — choose "Internal Page" or "External URL"
  - `internalPage` — shown when linkType is "internal" (e.g., `/insights`, `/community`, `#section-id`)
  - `externalUrl` — shown when linkType is "external" (full URL)

### 2. **TypeScript types** (`types.ts`)
- Added `ShowMoreConfig` interface
- Updated `PageSection` to include `showMore`

### 3. **Reusable component** (`show-more-button.tsx`)
- Handles internal and external links
- Uses Next.js `Link` for internal routes
- Uses anchor tag with `target="_blank"` for external URLs
- Includes arrow icon with hover animation

### 4. **Section components updated**
- All sections (Hero, Stats, Solutions, Community, Insights, CTA, Content) now accept and render the `showMore` button when enabled
- Button appears at the bottom of each section

### 5. **Section renderer** (`section-renderer.tsx`)
- Passes `showMore` config to all section components

In Sanity Studio, each homepage section now has a "Show More / Explore More" section where you can:
- Enable/disable the button
- Edit the button text
- Choose between internal page or external URL
- Set the destination link

The button appears at the bottom of the section when enabled.

---
